about_the_game:
COMING SOON

As a massive corporation continues to tighten its grip on the lower-classed workforce, societal cracks are beginning to show. Unrest is growing in the lower city as its underpaid citizens struggle to survive day to day. When a horrific plot to forcefully subdue entire districts full of workers is revealed, there seems to be no way out. Can a long-abandoned city provide a path forward?

Solve puzzles, meet characters, and explore the city to unravel the story of this dystopian world!


Add this game to your wish list now and get notified when the free demo is released!

name: Null District

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 32 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 2070 GTX or higher with latest NVIDIA binary drivers
  • Storage: 25 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 4080 GTX or higher with latest NVIDIA binary drivers
  • Storage: 25 GB available space

short_description: A puzzle-adventure game set in a gritty Cyberpunk themed world. Unravel the stories hidden within the city!
